Description.Text: The Mercure Madrid Santo Domingo hotel. A unique hotel with 200 rooms right in the heart of Madrid with an excellent location and great services. Among the hotel's many attractive features are its themed rooms with murals, the lobby, which is crowned withporcelain and gold leaf arches, and the decorated car park. Over 12,917 sq. ft. (1200 m2) of room space with natural light for meetings or banquets, and an outdoor rooftop pool with fantastic views over Madrid (see hotel for opening dates)

1 Qn bed Std - Standard Room with 1 queen-size bed. Unique personalized decor. 63 x 75" (160 x 190 cm) bed. Desk, air conditioning, LCD TV with 50 channels, free WIFI, safe, minibar, bathtub, magnifying mirror, hairdryer and telephone. LED reading lights.
2 Sg beds Std - Standard Room with twin beds. Unique personalized decor. Two 35 x 75" (90 x 190 cm) beds. Desk, air conditioning, LCD TV with 50 channels, free WIFI, safe, minibar, bathtub, magnifying mirror, hairdryer and telephone. LED reading lights.
1 Db bed Std - SMART ROOM WITH ONE BED. SMART room for 1 or 2 people, 151-172 sq. ft, 63x75-inch bed. Bathroom with bathtub or shower, air conditioning, LCD TV with 50 channels, free WIFI, safe, minibar, hairdryer and magnifying mirror. Over 20 different creative room
Suite 1 Kg bed Sup - Suite. 646 sq. ft. suite, separate lounge, 79 x 79" bed, unique decor. Bathrobe, slippers, 2pm check-out, welcome drink, Premium free WIFI. Desk, air conditioning, LCD TV (50 channels), safe, minibar, tub, magnifying mirror, hairdryer, phone, LED readin
1 Db bed Sup Panorama V - Corner Room. Spacious, panoramic view, exclusive decor. 79x79" bed, color-change shower, bathrobe, slippers, 2pm check-out, welcome drink, Premium free WIFI. Desk, air conditioning, LCD TV (50 channels), safe, minibar, tub, mirror, hairdryer, phone. LED
2 Sg beds Sup - SUPERIOR ROOM WITH TWIN BEDS. Spacious & comfortable, unique decor. Bathrobe, slippers, 2pm check-out, welcome drink, Premium free WIFI. Two 35 x 75" beds. Desk, air conditioning, LCD TV (50 channels), safe, minibar, bathtub, magnifying mirror, hairdrye
1 Qn bed Sup - SUPERIOR ROOM WITH A QUEEN-SIZE BED. Spacious & comfortable with unique decor. Bathrobe, slippers, 2pm check-out, welcome drink, Premium free WIFI. 63 x 75" bed. Desk, air conditioning, LCD TV (5 channels), safe, minibar, bathtub, magnifying mirror, hai
3 Sg beds Std - TRIPLE ROOM. Two 35 x 75" (90 x 190 cm) beds and one spare bed, unique decor and air conditioning, LCD TV with 50 channels, free WIFI, safe, hairdryer and magnifying mirror. LED reading lights.
